Summary: Pulsating Red and White lights Over trees(NON MOVING)
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked at the sky before i was going to bed when i saw a bright star i thought it was just the North Star but then i look out the other window and saw that it was on the other side. I immediately woke up my family and showed this thing to them. We could not figure it out, I watched it for over a 30 minutes and it didnt move so it wasnt a airplane or helicopter. Now the most common answer to this is that its just a star and the red I was seeing is just the solar flares. Although this wasnt at the altitude of all the other stars and in fact i saw the exact same object farther from where i was flying at the same altitude. I really want to figure at what this thing was and i wouldnt be surprised if anyone else saw it. It was very bright and stayed up there for over an hour. After watching the object for over and hour i thought i was going to have a seisure with the pulsating lights. I tried to rest my eyes for a little bit and then wake up when it was lighter out to see what this thing was. Unfortanetly i feel asleep.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around July 21st 2008
